text: Alison Fields is an American art historian, currently the Mary Lou Milner Carver Professor of Art of the American West at University of Oklahoma. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:University of Oklahoma faculty Category:American art historians Category:Colgate University alumni Category:Brown University alumni Category:University of New Mexico alumni Category:Historians from New York (state)
title: Alison Fields
